itemInfo.itemDesc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing. Rough Black Crystal requires a certain level of skill to collect.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Gathered near the Mediah Abandoned Iron Mine.

item.name: Black Crystal
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Rough Black Crystals.
